sentences.en: Briefly, the hunter and his quarry glared at each other.
sentences.cn: 一时间，猎手和他的猎物四目相对。

sentences.en: Each quarry on an average employs about 120 workers.
sentences.cn: 每座矿山平均雇佣120个工人.

sentences.en: Each sentence seems a quarry of rich meditations.
sentences.cn: 每一句话似乎都给人以许多冥思默想.

sentences.en: Even then she was certain the quarry stirred with life.
sentences.cn: 甚至在那时,她就肯定地认为,这个采石场里充满生气.

sentences.en: Good, thought Huck, they will bury it in the old quarry.
sentences.cn: 好吧, 哈克心里想, 他们会把宝箱埋在石坑里.

sentences.en: I'm waiting with my net set; somehow I'll catch my quarry.
sentences.cn: 我正张网以待, 无论如何会捕捉到猎物的.

sentences.en: Quarry tiles are a popular kitchen flooring.
sentences.cn: 缸砖是一种流行的厨房地面材料。

sentences.en: The dogs soon flushed the quarry.
The hawk descend in a vertical stoop on its quarry.
sentences.cn: 鹰向它的猎物直冲而下.

sentences.en: The hounds are getting close to their quarry.
The large limestone caves are also quarried for cement.
sentences.cn: 这些大石灰岩洞也用来开采水泥原料。

sentences.en: The policeman watched his quarry go into a bar.
sentences.cn: 警察看着他在追捕的人走进一家酒吧.

sentences.en: the site of a disused quarry
The temple of Bel - Marduk was being used by builders as a quarry.
sentences.cn: 柏儿 ― 马杜克庙被建筑工人们用来作采石的场所.

sentences.en: The true dips are commonly observed in quarry faces, cuttings and cliffs etc.
sentences.cn: 在采场面, 断面和断崖等面上人们常看到真倾角.

sentences.en: The ultimate solution would appear to be transporting it back to the quarry.
sentences.cn: 看来最终的办法是将其送回矿坑内.

sentences.en: We watched the workmen quarry out a hyge block of marble.
sentences.cn: 我们看到劳工们挖出一大块大理石.

trans.tran_cn: 采石场，猎物，正方形，菱形，来源
trans.tran_en: a place where large amounts of stone or sand are dug out of the ground
to dig stone or sand from a quarry
